description:
- Added the ability to sign withdrawals with FIDO-key for better safety and smoother user experience
- Updated the withdrawal logic and changed the technical addresses management for better withdrawal speed and possible fee economy
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the functionality for sending internal transfers to other Gekkard users using only their phone number or IBAN
- Updated authentication process with the ability to use FIDO-keys
- Merged Withdraw and Transfer pages — now you can initiate transfers of all kinds in one place
- Minor bug fixes

- Added application's versions to dashboard
- Moved full transaction history to dedicated page
- Minor bug fixes

- Released beta-version of PWA-mode (Progressive Web Application) — you can now install Gekkard web application right from the browser
- Updated mobile pages for the accounts and token search
- Updated desktop page for the account
- Fixed minor bugs and issues

- Added bank card functionality (limits setup, temporary disabling limits, full card details)
- Added pages My settings, FAQ
- Minor bug fixes

- Added functionality for agent to create agent code, monitor referrals' activity and see reward history
- Added the ability for agent to choose the reward program
- Minor bug fixes

- Added detailed information about service fees to the Settings page
- Added legal information to the Settings page
- Minor bug fixes

- Added authorised chat with support
- Added full history — now you can see full transactions history across all currencies in one place
- Minor bug fixes

- Added unauthorised chat with support
- Added localisation for German
- Updated the login page design
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the ability to transfer session to Gekkoin invest platform — now you can smoothly and safely visit Gekkoin invest platform without the need for additional authentication
- Minor bug fixes

- Added bank card functionality (block card, order additional card)
- Updated the design and functionality of the mobile version of the main screen
- Updated the dropdown account menu
- Minor bug fixes

- Added bank card functionality (send SEPA transfer, send transfer to contact, see balance)
- Added independent 2FA for withdraw operations for security measures
- Added detailed descriptions of various cashback programs available on the platform
- Minor bug fixes

- Updated the status check for certain transactions in EVM-based blockchains — now the failed transactions doesn't require manual sorting and you can access your funds faster and try to withdraw once more in case blockchain has rejected the initial transaction
- Updated the design elements across the web application according to a new visual style guide for better and smoother visual user experience
- Minor bug fixes

- Updated the list of the crypto assets according to current market conditions
- Added bank card functionality (list cards, choose card, see history for chosen card)
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the ability to set wallet-base personal fees for operations
- Blocked operations between physical persons and legal persons except if the client person is the same
- Added the ability to manual set blockchain fees as a failsafe system so you can use networks even if there are some technical difficulties with automatic fee updates
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the ability to automatically monitor the bank statement — now the buy/sell operations with EURG and EUR will run much faster than before
- Updated the transaction history data — now more information about the transaction and in a better visual style
- Added the automatic updates for blockchain fee — now you can be sure that the fee is relevant and the transaction will be most likely added to blockchain as soon as possible
- Minor bug fixes

- Updated Partnership program page
- Implemented measures for a better loading experience for slow Internet connection
- Added full descriptions to Crypto assets page
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the ability to see the full wallet lists available for the client and switch between them
- Added the ability to initiate full update of the bank client's data in case the data has changed (new phone number, added Gekkard PRO account, etc.)
- Minor bug fixes

- Moved the crypto deposit functionality to a different platform — now you can see all your Gekkoin investment products and interact with them in a separate dedicated Gekkoin investment platform
- Added the functionality of packaged transfers with a code — now you can create a transfer with a certain currency and of a certain amount, package it to a short code and share with another Gekkard user
- Minor bug fixes

- Released the algorithm for GKE reward on balance
- Released the algorithm for agent rewards for investments
- Increased Binance Smart Chain blockchain performance
- Increased the speed and safety of bank operations and data extraction using internal data exchange mechanisms
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the functionality of packaged transfers with a code — now you can create a transfer with a certain currency and of a certain amount, package it to a short code and share with another Gekkard user
- Added the ability to monitor, cancel short code transfers
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the ability to create and utilise promotion codes with agent links and with short code transfers
- Added the ability to unblock incoming transactions after specifying the sender's name
- Added the ability to see the full data about a blockchain transaction — now you can even follow the link and inspect the transaction in the corresponding blockchain explorer
- Minor bug fixes

- Updated the crypto wallet page — now you will have a better experience with your wallet 
- Updated EURG wallet page — added functionality and better experience with Gekkoin Euro utility token
- Minor bug fixes

- Better performance — data synchronisation with banking institution
- Set up necessary functionality updates the Gekkard PRO users
- Added the ability to early close every investment according to relevant terms and conditions
- Minor bug fixes

- Added filtration for transaction types in transaction history
- Added the withdraw functionality for Ethereum-based ERC-20 tokens
- Added the withdraw functionality for TRON-based TRC-20 tokens
- Added the withdraw functionality for BSC-based BEP-20 tokens
- Minor bug fixes

- Added sidebar menu — now you can easily access all accounts and see balance and incoming transactions right in the interactive sidebar
- Added the exchange page — now you can monitor trading activity, place orders, cancel orders and see your trading history in one place
- Added the ability to create private exchange rooms for private exchanges — create private room that only people you invite can enter, invite people with easily sharable link, manage permissions, close rooms as you wish
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the top-up functionality for Ethereum-based ERC-20 tokens
- Added the top-up functionality for TRON-based TRC-20 tokens
- Added the top-up functionality for BSC-based BEP-20 tokens
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the cashback program for GKE token — now you can get cashback for your GKE balance every month
- Added GKE boost for investments — now you can get up to a 2x more profitable and 2x safer investments if you 'freeze' the same amount of GKE tokens
- Added the ability to get a 100% discount for but and sell operations with EURG and EUR
- Added GKE token support — now you can store GKE tokens in the wallet and get perks and bonuses with it
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the withdraw functionality for Ethereum
- Added the withdraw functionality for Monero
- Added the withdraw functionality for Bitcoin
- Added the withdraw functionality for TRON
- Added the withdraw functionality for Binance Smart Chain
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the ability to buy EURG tokens directly from your bank account
- Added the ability to sell EURG token and get the EUR directly to your bank account
- Added the ability to authenticate with the Gekkard mobile app credentials — now you can enter Gekkard web application just as easily as you enter your Gekkard mobile app
- Minor bug fixes

- Added the top-up functionality for Ethereum
- Added the top-up functionality for Monero
- Added the top-up functionality for Bitcoin
- Added the top-up functionality for TRON
- Added the top-up functionality for Binance Smart Chain
- Minor bug fixes

- Added technical address generation for Ethereum
- Added technical address generation for TRON
- Added technical address generation for Monero
- Added technical address generation for Bitcoin
- Added technical address generation for Binance Smart Chain
- Minor bug fixes
